result.markdown:
--- title: "Yearly time series" author: Raphael Saldanha date: last-modified --- This notebook aims to cluster the Brazilian municipalities considering yearly dengue cases time-series similarities. ## Packages ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(arrow) library(timetk) library(dtwclust) library(kableExtra) library(tictoc) source("../functions.R") ``` ::: ## Load data Load the bundled data. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} dengue <- open_dataset(sources = data_dir("bundled_data/tdengue.parquet")) %>% select(mun, date, cases = cases_raw) %>% collect() dim(dengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 163326 3 ``` ::: ::: ### Prepare data The chunk bellow executes various steps to prepare the data for clustering. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tdengue <- dengue %>% # Remove dates filter(date >= as.Date("2011-01-01") & date < as.Date("2020-01-01")) %>% # Create year variable mutate(year = year(date)) %>% # Create week number mutate(week = epiweek(date)) %>% # Summarise per year and isoweek group_by(mun, year, week) %>% summarise(cases = sum(cases, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% # Scale cases mutate(cases = scale(cases)) %>% ungroup() %>% # Isolate municipality and year mutate(mun = paste0(mun, "_", year)) %>% select(-year, week) %>% # Arrange data arrange(mun, week) %>% # Prepare time series of municipalities by year mutate(mun = paste0("m_", mun)) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = mun, values_from = cases) %>% select(-week) %>% # Use zero value for years withot week 53 mutate(across(everything(), ~replace_na(.x, 0))) %>% # Transpose as matrix t() %>% # Convert object tslist() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` `summarise()` has grouped output by 'mun', 'year'. You can override using the `.groups` argument. ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} length(tdengue) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 2934 ``` ::: ::: ## Clustering Sequence of `k` groups to be used. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} k_seq <- 3:10 ``` ::: ### Soft-DTW method ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tic() clust <- tsclust( series = tdengue, type = "partitional", k = k_seq, distance = "sdtw", seed = 12 ) toc() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 44.08 sec elapsed ``` ::: ::: ### Cluster Validity Indices (CVI) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} names(clust) <- paste0("k_", k_seq) res_cvi <- sapply(clust, cvi, type = "internal") %>% t() %>% as_tibble(rownames = "k") %>% arrange(-Sil) res_cvi %>% kbl() %>% kable_styling() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
k Sil SF CH DB DBstar D COP
k_4 0.3975339 0 1015.2950 1.131014 1.606254 -0.0034400 0.1863201
k_3 0.3897864 0 1288.4826 1.328894 1.383909 -0.0045315 0.2370780
k_6 0.3269696 0 782.9768 1.395379 2.170699 -0.0063684 0.1599595
k_10 0.2657410 0 553.2726 1.768598 2.451972 -0.0076318 0.1043422
k_8 0.2207365 0 482.8717 1.947089 3.682490 -0.0066668 0.1553254
k_5 0.1715843 0 788.1167 2.063168 3.808034 -0.0046415 0.1718508
k_7 0.1438586 0 526.1138 3.151843 5.374407 -0.0026465 0.1308538
k_9 0.0685331 0 485.7220 3.041267 6.026110 -0.0054262 0.1687341
````` ::: ::: ### Cluster with higher Silhouette statistic ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sel_clust <- clust[[res_cvi[[1,1]]]] ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(sel_clust) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_mun_year_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave(filename = "cluster_mun_year.pdf") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Saving 7 x 5 in image ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} plot(sel_clust, type = "centroids", lty = 1) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](cluster_mun_year_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave(filename = "cluster_mun_year_centr.pdf") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Saving 7 x 5 in image ``` ::: ::: ### Cluster sizes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} table(sel_clust@cluster) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 1 2 3 4 1719 467 387 361 ``` ::: ::: ## Session info ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sessionInfo() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` R version 4.1.2 (2021-11-01) Platform: x86_64-pc-linux-gnu (64-bit) Running
